name: BicarbonateVenousLabTest
title: Bicarbonate Venous Lab Test
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab tests commonly used for a Bicarbonate  lab test using a venous source specimen of  blood/serum/plasma  based on a Moles/volume measurement.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had a Bicarbonate lab test using a specimen source of blood/serum/plasma. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to 'Laboratory Test, Performed".),(Inclusion Criteria: Bicarbonate lab test using a venous source of blood/serum/plasma based on a measurement scale of Moles/volume.),(Exclusion Criteria: Bicarbonate lab test using any other source of blood specimen (ex. arterial or capillary).)

concept.display: Carbon dioxide, total [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma

contains.display: Carbon dioxide, total [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
